state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled lettuce. -= Bedroom =- I am excited to announce that you are now in the bedroom. You start to take note of what's in the room. You make out a chest drawer. Hmm. You always thought you'd be more excited to see a chest drawer in a room. You smell an awful smell, and follow it to an antique trunk. You can make out a king-size bed. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it? There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
